changesSince

(
  • snapshot
)
Object

Inherited from ozpIwc.api.base.Node: src\js\bus\api\base\node.js:397

From a given snapshot, create a change notifications. This is not a delta, rather it's change structure.

API subclasses can override if there are additional change notifications.

Parameters:

  • snapshot Object

    The state of the value at some time in the past.

Returns:

Object:

A record of the current value and the value of the snapshot.

Sets a data based upon the content of the packet. Automatically updates the content type, permissions, entity, and updates the version.

Parameters:

snapshot

() ozpIwc.packet.Transport

Inherited from ozpIwc.api.base.Node: src\js\bus\api\base\node.js:381

Generates a point-in-time snapshot of this value that can later be sent to {@link ozpIwc.CommonApiValue#changesSince} to determine the changes made to the value. This value should be considered opaque to consumers.

For API subclasses, the default behavior is to simply call toPacket(). Subclasses can override this, but should likely override {@link ozpIwc.CommonApiValue#changesSince} as well.

Returns:

ozpIwc.packet.Transport:

(
  • [base]
)
